entry.title: Photos Post 22: Special Events (after 1975), Part 55
entry.content:
Dear Sahaja Yogis and Sahaja Yoginīs,

We are pleased to let you know that 2 Photos from the special event 1990-1209 Procession, Haregaon (near Śhrīrāmpur), India have been uploaded to Eternal Moments: 2 high resolutions from the Named Collections.
The direct link to the 47 Photos of the event in the smallest gallery: India 1990-0101 to 1214<.
Please kindly share the link with all our brothers and sisters.

Jay Śhrī Mātājī!

The Photo Subteam
sahajayoga.compilations@gmail.com
https://linktr.ee/comprehensivecompilationsteam
